title: fo-07: KV Store Prompts and Seed Data
description:
Add FO-07 prompts to the KV store seed script

## Context

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-27-fo-07/2026-01-27-fo-07-spec.md`

**Key files for this epic:**
- `src/db/seed.ts` - Add FO-07 prompt entries
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-04/agent.ts` - Reference for discovery agent prompts
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-04/affirmation-agent.ts` - Reference for affirmation prompts

**Prompts to add:**
- `versions.fo-07-discovery.system.default` - Discovery agent system prompt
- `versions.fo-07-discovery.prompt.default` - Discovery prompt
- `versions.fo-07-affirmation.system.default` - Affirmation generation system prompt
- `versions.fo-07-affirmation.prompt.default` - Generate 20 affirmations in single call
- `versions.fo-07-summary.system.default` - Summary generation
- `versions.fo-07-summary.prompt.default` - Combined summary prompt
